          <title>
            <string language="en">Microwaves and cancer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowellen und Krebs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Micro-ondes et cancer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Microondas e cancer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Microonde e cancro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μικροκύματα και καρκίνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microondas y cáncer</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment for determining if microwaves can cause cancer in living cells.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cancer</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Experiment für die 
Bestimmung, wenn Mikrowellen Krebs in lebenden Zellen verursachen 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une expérience pour 
déterminer si les micro-ondes peuvent causer le cancer en cellules 
vivantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma experiência para 
determinar se as microondas puderem causar o cancer em pilhas vivas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un esperimento per la
determinazione se le microonde possono causare il cancro in cellule 
viventi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα για τον 
καθορισμό εάν τα μικροκύματα μπορούν να προκαλέσουν τον καρκίνο 
στα ζωντανά κύτταρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimento para 
determinarse si las microondas pueden causar el cáncer en células 
vivas.</string>
          </description>
